name: K-Pop Manager
description:
A K-Pop Manager game in development!

Take your trainees, and go from nothing to a perfect all-kill!

Currently in proof of concept mode, built for a Ubisoft application.
This build is super super early in development < 2 weeks.

Current features include:

  1. Hire trainees and add them to your group
  2. Make an album with your group

Note: Missing UI Feedback

  • No feedback on hiring a trainee, although the list will update
  • Can't hire a trainee if you don't have enough cash
  • Can't hire a trainee while you're working on an album
  • After an album is done, you get money, but it applies instantly in a lump sum, and will just update the value on the bottom bar

Note  2: There's basically no UI feedback, QoL fixes. Working on the minimum viable product before implementing all the things necessary to make it "playable". Loads of work to do, but the core of it seems to be working.

Need to write loads of algorithms for stat increases, album sales, marketing through variety shows, group fan names, etc.

The skeletons are nearly there, just gotta build on it!

Follow development at: https://trello.com/b/Y0LFLZ6t/k-pop-manager
